text.4_Chapter, 21_Mishnah: ...Ben Bag Bag akati: Fukura, ufukure zvakare, nekuti zvese zviri mazviri. Tarisa mukati maro; uye vake uchembera uye uve mukuru mairi; uye usabva pariri, nekuti hauna mugove uri nani kupfuura uyu.
text.4_Chapter, 22_Mishnah: Ben He He akati: Maererano nekushanda, mubairo.
